attributes.action: Give more leniency to Btec subjects for year 13s
attributes.additional_details: Btecs are often overlooked with help given mostly to alevels and GCSEs. The current year 13s have been submitting coursework throughout lockdown without much assistance or guidance. We had limited help from teachers and next to no resources. Also, with the students that just got results, received high grades without having to work for them meaning when it comes to university applications people that took gap years due to corona have way higher chances of being accepted than the current year 13s.
attributes.background: Give more help to those that do btec subjects with a lot of coursework. We should have time to go back over old assignments that we didn’t get help with instead of starting new ones. This will help us improve our grades instead of falling behind.

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about the impact of Covid-19 on BTEC students, but it's not clear what you want the Government or House of Commons to do about this.

Individual educational institutions, not the Government or House of Commons, are responsible for the support they give to students during their courses.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778
